Imagery Description: (a) Amazonomachy — two Amazons in oriental costume attacking a naked Greek warrior, who has fallen down onto the ground, (b) toilet scene—above: female head in window; below: nude woman with mirror kneeling before footNon Sepcifiedbath on stand, approached by flying Eros, nude woman standing, resting left hand on draperyNon Sepcifiedcovered pillar.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
